title: cmd/go: go test gives discrepant warning when package only has example tests
body:
by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
If p is a package with a file p_test.go containing:

package p
func Example() {}

and p has no further tests, go test says:

testing: warning: no tests to run
PASS
ok  	p	0.004s

Surely, this warning is somewhat discrepant.

Which revision are you using? 5851ef646cbd+
